Sentencas: In order to improve the performance of a cathode in a new solid oxide fuel cell (one chamber with methane-air mixture), a surface-modified yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) with praseodymium oxide was tested as a solid electrolyte of this cell.
Titulo: Performance of a one-chamber solid oxide fuel cell with a surface-modified zirconia electrolyte

Sentencas: The cell gave a stable open-circuit voltage of about 700 mV at 1223 K, and the maximum electric power density was about 60 times higher than that using ''bare'' YSZ.
Titulo: Performance of a one-chamber solid oxide fuel cell with a surface-modified zirconia electrolyte

Sentencas: The difference in cell performance between bare YSZ and surface-modified YSZ is discussed in relation to the transient cathode potential at open circuit and the cathodic polarization during discharge.
Titulo: Performance of a one-chamber solid oxide fuel cell with a surface-modified zirconia electrolyte
